description:
Rebuilding value of residential buildings erected in 1913/14

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
61261 Price indices for the construction industry

Definition:
The data make it possible to determine rebuilding values of
residential buildings from construction costs (marks)
incurred in 1913 or 1914 and, vice versa, to determine
comparable construction values (marks) for 1913 or 1914 from
current construction costs.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2016
name: Rebuilding value: residential buildings (1913/14)
